comment.author: 80579948@N02
comment._content: I am glad to see this photo posted !! I have the same photo, as the big chested guy directly under the nose is my dad, SSG Warren R. Sikes. The caption at the bottom of the picture I have says " G-256 engineering section of the 823 Bomb Squadron- New Guinea October 1943" Thanks for posting the picture Ken Sikes

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/80579948@N02] Your welcome, glad you found it!
